alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:29PM CDT until June 14 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Southeastern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Northwestern Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Southwestern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hickory, or 10 miles east of Newton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chunky around 440 PM CDT. Meehan around 445 PM CDT. Enterprise around 455 PM CDT. Savoy around 505 PM CDT. Sable around 515 PM CDT. Zero around 520 PM CDT. Middleton around 530 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
